participant_1.background:
My cats are my family, and I don't know what I would do without them.
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike.
i love eating kale.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.

participant_2.background:
I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up.
i own a corvette.
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
I'm not too concerned with my appearance.
I have not weighed myself in a long time.

content.text: I'm so excited for my cosplay costume to come in the mail! I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
What kind of costume is it?
I'm going to be Sailor Moon!
That's awesome! I love Sailor Moon!
Me too! I've always loved her.
I used to watch Sailor Moon all the time when I was a kid.
I used to watch it too! It was my favorite show.
Me too! I loved all the different characters and their powers.
Me too! I always wanted to be Sailor Moon when I was a kid.
Me too! I think she's such a great role model for girls.
I agree! She's strong, independent, and kind. She's everything a girl should be.
She's definitely one of my favorite characters from any show.
Me too! I'm so excited to be cosplaying her!
